   23: -module(ssh_options_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: %%% This test suite tests different options for the ssh functions
   26: 
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   30: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   31: 
   32: %%% Test cases
   33: -export([
   34:          auth_method_kb_interactive_data_tuple/1,
   35:          auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun3/1,
   36:          auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun4/1,
   37:          auth_none/1,
   38:          connectfun_disconnectfun_client/1, 
   39: 	 disconnectfun_option_client/1, 
   40: 	 disconnectfun_option_server/1, 
   41: 	 id_string_no_opt_client/1, 
   42: 	 id_string_no_opt_server/1, 
   43: 	 id_string_own_string_client/1, 
   44: 	 id_string_own_string_client_trail_space/1, 
   45: 	 id_string_own_string_server/1, 
   46: 	 id_string_own_string_server_trail_space/1, 
   47: 	 id_string_random_client/1, 
   48: 	 id_string_random_server/1, 
   49:          max_log_item_len/1,
   50: 	 max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_parallel/1, 
   51: 	 max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_sequential/1, 
   52: 	 max_sessions_ssh_connect_parallel/1, 
   53: 	 max_sessions_ssh_connect_sequential/1, 
   54:          max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects/1,
   55:          max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects/0,
   56: 	 server_password_option/1, 
   57: 	 server_userpassword_option/1, 
   58: 	 server_pwdfun_option/1,
   59: 	 server_pwdfun_4_option/1,
   60: 	 server_keyboard_interactive/1,
   61: 	 server_keyboard_interactive_extra_msg/1,
   62: 	 ssh_connect_arg4_timeout/1, 
   63: 	 ssh_connect_negtimeout_parallel/1, 
   64: 	 ssh_connect_negtimeout_sequential/1, 
   65: 	 ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_parallel/1,
   66: 	 ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_sequential/1,
   67: 	 ssh_connect_timeout/1, connect/4,
   68: 	 ssh_daemon_minimal_remote_max_packet_size_option/1, 
   69: 	 ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_client/1, 
   70: 	 ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_server/1, 
   71: 	 system_dir_option/1, 
   72: 	 unexpectedfun_option_client/1, 
   73: 	 unexpectedfun_option_server/1, 
   74: 	 user_dir_option/1,
   75: 	 user_dir_fun_option/1,
   76: 	 connectfun_disconnectfun_server/1,
   77: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check/1,
   78: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_md5/1,
   79: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha/1,
   80: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha256/1,
   81: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha384/1,
   82: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha512/1,
   83: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_list/1,
   84:          save_accepted_host_option/1,
   85:          raw_option/1,
   86:          config_file/1,
   87:          config_file_modify_algorithms_order/1,
   88:          daemon_replace_options_simple/1,
   89:          daemon_replace_options_algs/1,
   90:          daemon_replace_options_algs_connect/1,
   91:          daemon_replace_options_algs_conf_file/1
   92: 	]).
   93: 
   94: %%% Common test callbacks
   95: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0, 
   96: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   97: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, 
   98: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2
   99: 	]).
  100: 
  101: %%% For test nodes
  102: -export([get_preferred_algorithms/2
  103:         ]).
  104: 
  105: -define(NEWLINE, <<"\r\n">>).
  106: 
  107: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  108: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  110: 
  111: suite() ->
  112:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  113:      {timetrap,{seconds,15}}].
  114: 
  115: all() -> 
  116:     [connectfun_disconnectfun_server,
  117:      connectfun_disconnectfun_client,
  118:      server_password_option,
  119:      server_userpassword_option,
  120:      server_pwdfun_option,
  121:      server_pwdfun_4_option,
  122:      server_keyboard_interactive,
  123:      server_keyboard_interactive_extra_msg,
  124:      auth_method_kb_interactive_data_tuple,
  125:      auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun3,
  126:      auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun4,
  127:      auth_none,
  128:      {group, dir_options},
  129:      ssh_connect_timeout,
  130:      ssh_connect_arg4_timeout,
  131:      ssh_daemon_minimal_remote_max_packet_size_option,
  132:      ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_client,
  133:      ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_server,
  134:      disconnectfun_option_server,
  135:      disconnectfun_option_client,
  136:      unexpectedfun_option_server,
  137:      unexpectedfun_option_client,
  138:      hostkey_fingerprint_check,
  139:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_md5,
  140:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha,
  141:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha256,
  142:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha384,
  143:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha512,
  144:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_list,
  145:      id_string_no_opt_client,
  146:      id_string_own_string_client,
  147:      id_string_own_string_client_trail_space,
  148:      id_string_random_client,
  149:      id_string_no_opt_server,
  150:      id_string_own_string_server,
  151:      id_string_own_string_server_trail_space,
  152:      id_string_random_server,
  153:      max_log_item_len,
  154:      save_accepted_host_option,
  155:      raw_option,
  156:      config_file,
  157:      config_file_modify_algorithms_order,
  158:      daemon_replace_options_simple,
  159:      daemon_replace_options_algs,
  160:      daemon_replace_options_algs_connect,
  161:      daemon_replace_options_algs_conf_file,
  162:      {group, hardening_tests}
  163:     ].
  164: 
  165: groups() ->
  166:     [{hardening_tests, [], [ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_parallel,
  167: 			    ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_sequential,
  168: 			    ssh_connect_negtimeout_parallel,
  169: 			    ssh_connect_negtimeout_sequential,
  170: 			    max_sessions_ssh_connect_parallel,
  171: 			    max_sessions_ssh_connect_sequential,
  172: 			    max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_parallel,
  173: 			    max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_sequential,
  174:                             max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects
  175: 			   ]},
  176:      {dir_options, [], [user_dir_option,
  177:                         user_dir_fun_option,
  178: 			system_dir_option]}
  179:     ].
  180: 
  181: 
  182: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  183: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  184:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(Config).
  185: 
  186: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  187:     ssh:stop().
  188: 
  189: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  190: init_per_group(hardening_tests, Config) ->
  191:     ct:log("Pub keys setup for: ~p",
  192:            [ssh_test_lib:setup_all_user_host_keys(Config)]),
  193:     Config;
  194: init_per_group(dir_options, Config) ->
  195:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  196:     %% Make unreadable dir:
  197:     Dir_unreadable = filename:join(PrivDir, "unread"),
  198:     ok = file:make_dir(Dir_unreadable),
  199:     {ok,F1} = file:read_file_info(Dir_unreadable),
  200:     ok = file:write_file_info(Dir_unreadable, 
  201: 			      F1#file_info{mode = F1#file_info.mode band (bnot 8#00444)}),
  202:     %% Make readable file:
  203:     File_readable = filename:join(PrivDir, "file"),
  204:     ok = file:write_file(File_readable, <<>>),
  205: 
  206:     %% Check:
  207:     case {file:read_file_info(Dir_unreadable), 
  208: 	  file:read_file_info(File_readable)} of
  209: 	{{ok, Id=#file_info{type=directory, access=Md}},
  210: 	 {ok, If=#file_info{type=regular,   access=Mf}}} ->
  211: 	    AccessOK =
  212: 		case {Md,                Mf} of
  213: 		    {read,               _} -> false;
  214: 		    {read_write,         _} -> false;
  215: 		    {_,               read} -> true;
  216: 		    {_,         read_write} -> true;
  217: 		    _ -> false
  218: 		end,
  219: 
  220: 	    case AccessOK of
  221: 		true ->
  222: 		    %% Save:
  223: 		    [{unreadable_dir, Dir_unreadable},
  224: 		     {readable_file, File_readable} 
  225: 		     | Config];
  226: 		false ->
  227: 		    ct:log("File#file_info : ~p~n"
  228: 			   "Dir#file_info  : ~p",[If,Id]),
  229: 		    {skip, "File or dir mode settings failed"}
  230: 	    end;
  231: 
  232: 	NotDirFile ->
  233: 	    ct:log("{Dir,File} -> ~p",[NotDirFile]),
  234: 	    {skip, "File/Dir creation failed"}
  235:     end;
  236: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  237:     Config.
  238: 
  239: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  240:     Config.
  241: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  242: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  243:     ssh:start(),
  244:     %% Create a clean user_dir
  245:     UserDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), nopubkey),
  246:     ssh_test_lib:del_dirs(UserDir),
  247:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  248:     [{user_dir,UserDir}|Config].
  249: 
  250: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  251:     ssh:stop(),
  252:     ok.
  253: 
  254: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  255: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  256: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  257: 
  258: %%% validate to server that uses the 'password' option
  259: server_password_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  261:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  262:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  263: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  264: 					     {password, "morot"}]),
  265: 
  266:     ConnectionRef =
  267: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  268: 					  {user, "foo"},
  269: 					  {password, "morot"},
  270: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  271: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  272: 
  273:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  274:     
  275:     {error, Reason} =
  276: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  277:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  278: 				 {user, "vego"},
  279: 				 {password, "foo"},
  280: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  281: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  282:     
  283:     ct:log("Test of wrong password: Error msg: ~p ~n", [Reason]),
  284: 
  285:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  286:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  287: 
  288: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  289: 
  290: %%% validate to server that uses the 'password' option
  291: server_userpassword_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  292:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  293:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
  294:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  295: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  296: 					     {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]}]),
  297: 
  298:     ConnectionRef =
  299: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  300: 					  {user, "vego"},
  301: 					  {password, "morot"},
  302: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  303: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  304:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  305: 
  306:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  307: 
  308:     {error, Reason} =
  309: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  310:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  311: 				 {user, "foo"},
  312: 				 {password, "morot"},
  313: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  314: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  315:     {error, Reason} =
  316: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  317:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  318: 				 {user, "vego"},
  319: 				 {password, "foo"},
  320: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  321: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  322:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  323: 
  324: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  325: %%% validate to server that uses the 'pwdfun' option
  326: server_pwdfun_option(Config) ->
  327:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  328:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
  329:     CHKPWD = fun("foo",Pwd) -> Pwd=="bar";
  330: 		(_,_) -> false
  331: 	     end,
  332:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  333: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  334: 					     {pwdfun,CHKPWD}]),
  335:     ConnectionRef =
  336: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  337: 					  {user, "foo"},
  338: 					  {password, "bar"},
  339: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  340: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  341:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  342: 
  343:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  344:     
  345:     {error, Reason} =
  346: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  347:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  348: 				 {user, "foo"},
  349: 				 {password, "morot"},
  350: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  351: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  352:     {error, Reason} =
  353: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  354:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  355: 				 {user, "vego"},
  356: 				 {password, "foo"},
  357: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  358: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  359:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  360: 
  361:     
  362: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  363: %%% validate to server that uses the 'pwdfun/4' option
  364: server_pwdfun_4_option(Config) ->
  365:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  366:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
  367:     PWDFUN = fun("foo",Pwd,{_,_},undefined) -> Pwd=="bar";
  368: 		("fie",Pwd,{_,_},undefined) -> {Pwd=="bar",new_state};
  369: 		("bandit",_,_,_) -> disconnect;
  370: 		(_,_,_,_) -> false
  371: 	     end,
  372:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  373: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  374: 					     {pwdfun,PWDFUN}]),
  375:     ConnectionRef1 =
  376: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  377: 					  {user, "foo"},
  378: 					  {password, "bar"},
  379: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  380: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  381:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef1),
  382: 
  383:     ConnectionRef2 =
  384: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  385: 					  {user, "fie"},
  386: 					  {password, "bar"},
  387: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  388: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  389:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef2),
  390: 
  391:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  392:     
  393:     {error, Reason} =
  394: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  395:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  396: 				 {user, "foo"},
  397: 				 {password, "morot"},
  398: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  399: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  400:     {error, Reason} =
  401: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  402:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  403: 				 {user, "fie"},
  404: 				 {password, "morot"},
  405: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  406: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  407:     {error, Reason} =
  408: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  409: 				 {user, "vego"},
  410: 				 {password, "foo"},
  411: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  412: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  413: 
  414:     {error, Reason} =
  415: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  416:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  417: 				 {user, "bandit"},
  418: 				 {password, "pwd breaking"},
  419: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  420: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  421:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  422: 
  423:     
  424: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  425: server_keyboard_interactive(Config) ->
  426:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  427:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  428:     %% Test that the state works
  429:     Parent = self(),
  430:     PWDFUN = fun("foo",P="bar",_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},true; 
  431: 		(_,P,_,S=undefined) -> Parent!{P,S},{false,1}; 
  432: 		(_,P,_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},          {false,S+1}
  433: 	     end,
  434:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  435: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  436: 					     {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  437: 					     {pwdfun,PWDFUN}]),
  438: 
  439:     %% Try with passwords "incorrect", "Bad again" and finally "bar"
  440:     KIFFUN = fun(_Name, _Instr, _PromptInfos) ->
  441: 		     K={k,self()},
  442:                      Answer =
  443:                          case get(K) of
  444:                              undefined ->
  445:                                  put(K,1),
  446:                                  ["incorrect"];
  447:                              2 ->
  448:                                  put(K,3),
  449:                                  ["bar"];
  450:                              S->
  451:                                  put(K,S+1),
  452:                                  ["Bad again"]
  453:                          end,
  454:                      ct:log("keyboard_interact_fun:~n"
  455:                             " Name        = ~p~n"
  456:                             " Instruction = ~p~n"
  457:                             " Prompts     = ~p~n"
  458:                             "~nAnswer:~n  ~p~n",
  459:                             [_Name, _Instr, _PromptInfos, Answer]),
  460: 
  461:                      Answer
  462: 	     end,
  463:     
  464:     ConnectionRef2 = 
  465: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  466: 					  {user, "foo"},
  467: 					  {keyboard_interact_fun, KIFFUN},
  468: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  469:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef2),
  470:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  471: 
  472:     lists:foreach(fun(Expect) ->
  473: 			  receive
  474: 			      Expect -> ok;
  475: 			      Other -> ct:fail("Expect: ~p~nReceived ~p",[Expect,Other])
  476: 			  after
  477: 			      2000 -> ct:fail("Timeout expecting ~p",[Expect])
  478: 			  end
  479: 		  end, [{"incorrect",undefined},
  480: 			{"Bad again",1},
  481: 			{"bar",2}]).
  482: 
  483: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  484: server_keyboard_interactive_extra_msg(Config) ->
  485:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  486:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  487:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  488: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  489: 					     {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  490:                                              {tstflg, [{one_empty,true}]},
  491:                                              {user_passwords, [{"foo","bar"}]}
  492:                                             ]),
  493: 
  494:     ConnectionRef =
  495: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  496: 					  {user, "foo"},
  497: 					  {password, "bar"},
  498: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  499:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  500:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  501: 
  502: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  503: auth_method_kb_interactive_data_tuple(Config) ->
  504:     T = {"abc1", "def1", "ghi1: ", true},
  505:     amkid(Config, T, T).
  506: 
  507: auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun3(Config) ->
  508:     T = {"abc2", "def2", "ghi2: ", true},
  509:     amkid(Config, T,
  510:           fun(_Peer, _User, _Service) -> T end
  511:          ).
  512: 
  513: auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun4(Config) ->
  514:     T = {"abc3", "def3", "ghi3: ", true},
  515:     amkid(Config, T,
  516:           fun(_Peer, _User, _Service, _State) -> T end
  517:          ).
  518: 
  519: amkid(Config, {ExpectName,ExpectInstr,ExpectPrompts,ExpectEcho}, OptVal) ->
  520:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  521:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  522:     %% Test that the state works
  523:     Parent = self(),
  524:     PWDFUN = fun("foo",P="bar",_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},true;
  525: 		(_,P,_,S=undefined) -> Parent!{P,S},{false,1};
  526: 		(_,P,_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},          {false,S+1}
  527: 	     end,
  528:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  529: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  530: 					     {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  531: 					     {pwdfun,PWDFUN},
  532:                                              {auth_method_kb_interactive_data,OptVal}
  533:                                             ]),
  534: 
  535:     KIFFUN = fun(Name, Instr, PromptInfos) ->
  536: 		     K={k,self()},
  537:                      Answer =
  538:                          case get(K) of
  539:                              undefined ->
  540:                                  put(K,1),
  541:                                  ["incorrect"];
  542:                              2 ->
  543:                                  put(K,3),
  544:                                  ["bar"];
  545:                              S->
  546:                                  put(K,S+1),
  547:                                  ["Bad again"]
  548:                          end,
  549:                      ct:log("keyboard_interact_fun:~n"
  550:                             " Name        = ~p~n"
  551:                             " Instruction = ~p~n"
  552:                             " Prompts     = ~p~n"
  553:                             "~nAnswer:~n  ~p~n",
  554:                             [Name, Instr, PromptInfos, Answer]),
  555:                      case {binary_to_list(Name),
  556:                            binary_to_list(Instr),
  557:                            [{binary_to_list(PI),Echo} || {PI,Echo} <- PromptInfos]
  558:                           } of
  559:                          {ExpectName, ExpectInstr, [{ExpectPrompts,ExpectEcho}]} ->
  560:                              ct:log("Match!", []),
  561:                              Answer;
  562:                          _ ->
  563:                              ct:log("Not match!~n"
  564:                                     " ExpectName        = ~p~n"
  565:                                     " ExpectInstruction = ~p~n"
  566:                                     " ExpectPrompts     = ~p~n",
  567:                                     [ExpectName, ExpectInstr, [{ExpectPrompts,ExpectEcho}]]),
  568:                              ct:fail("no_match")
  569:                      end
  570: 	     end,
  571:     ssh_dbg:start(), ssh_dbg:on(authentication), %% Test dbg code
  572:     ConnectionRef2 =
  573: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  574: 					  {user, "foo"},
  575: 					  {keyboard_interact_fun, KIFFUN},
  576: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  577:     ssh_dbg:stop(),
  578:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef2),
  579:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  580: 
  581:     lists:foreach(fun(Expect) ->
  582: 			  receive
  583: 			      Expect -> ok;
  584: 			      Other -> ct:fail("Expect: ~p~nReceived ~p",[Expect,Other])
  585: 			  after
  586: 			      2000 -> ct:fail("Timeout expecting ~p",[Expect])
  587: 			  end
  588: 		  end, [{"incorrect",undefined},
  589: 			{"Bad again",1},
  590: 			{"bar",2}]).
  591: 
  592: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  593: auth_none(Config) ->
  594:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  595:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
  596:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  597:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  598:     {DaemonRef, Host, Port} =
  599: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  600: 			     {user_dir, UserDir},
  601: 			     {auth_methods, "password"}, % to make even more sure we don't use public-key-auth
  602: 			     {user_passwords, [{"foo","somepwd"}]}, % Not to be used
  603:                              {no_auth_needed, true} % we test this
  604: 			    ]),
  605:     ClientConnRef1 =
  606: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  607: 					  {user, "some-other-user"},
  608: 					  {password, "wrong-pwd"},
  609: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  610: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  611:     "some-other-user" =
  612:         proplists:get_value(user, ssh:connection_info(ClientConnRef1, [user])),
  613:     ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef1),
  614:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef).
  615: 
  616: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  617: system_dir_option(Config) ->
  618:     DirUnread = proplists:get_value(unreadable_dir,Config),
  619:     FileRead = proplists:get_value(readable_file,Config),
  620: 
  621:     case ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, DirUnread}]) of
  622: 	{error,{eoptions,{{system_dir,DirUnread},eacces}}} ->
  623: 	    ok;
  624: 	{Pid1,_Host1,Port1} when is_pid(Pid1),is_integer(Port1) ->
  625: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid1),
  626: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that dir is unreadable", [])
  627: 	end,
  628:     
  629:     case ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, FileRead}]) of
  630: 	{error,{eoptions,{{system_dir,FileRead},enotdir}}} ->
  631: 	    ok;
  632: 	{Pid2,_Host2,Port2} when is_pid(Pid2),is_integer(Port2) ->
  633: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid2),
  634: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that option is a plain file", [])
  635:     end.
  636: 
  637: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  638: user_dir_option(Config) ->
  639:     DirUnread = proplists:get_value(unreadable_dir,Config),
  640:     FileRead = proplists:get_value(readable_file,Config),
  641:     %% Any port will do (beware, implementation knowledge!):
  642:     Port = 65535,
  643: 
  644:     case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{user_dir, DirUnread},
  645:                                          {save_accepted_host, false}]) of
  646: 	{error,{eoptions,{{user_dir,DirUnread},eacces}}} ->
  647: 	    ok;
  648: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  649: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that dir is unreadable", [])
  650:     end,
  651: 
  652:     case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{user_dir, FileRead},
  653:                                          {save_accepted_host, false}]) of
  654: 	{error,{eoptions,{{user_dir,FileRead},enotdir}}} ->
  655: 	    ok;
  656: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  657: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that option is a plain file", [])
  658:     end.
  659: 
  660: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  661: user_dir_fun_option(Config) ->
  662:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  663:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  664:     SysDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"system"),
  665:     ssh_test_lib:setup_all_host_keys(DataDir, SysDir),
  666:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"user"),
  667:     ssh_test_lib:setup_all_user_keys(DataDir, UserDir),
  668: 
  669:     Parent = self(),
  670:     Ref = make_ref(),
  671:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  672: 					     {user_dir_fun, fun(User) ->
  673:                                                                     ct:log("user_dir_fun called ~p",[User]),
  674:                                                                     Parent ! {user,Ref,User},
  675:                                                                     UserDir
  676:                                                             end},
  677: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  678:     _ConnectionRef =
  679: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  680: 					  {user, "foo"},
  681: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  682:                                           {auth_methods,"publickey"},
  683: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  684:     receive
  685:         {user,Ref,"foo"} ->
  686:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  687:             ok;
  688:         {user,Ref,What} ->
  689:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  690:             ct:log("Got ~p",[What]),
  691:             {fail, bad_userid}
  692:     after 2000 ->
  693:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  694:             {fail,timeout_in_receive}
  695:     end.
  696: 
  697: 
  698: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  699: %%% validate client that uses the 'ssh_msg_debug_fun' option
  700: ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_client(Config) ->
  701:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  702:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  703: 
  704:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  705: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  706: 					     {password, "morot"},
  707: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  708:     Parent = self(),
  709:     DbgFun = fun(ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang) -> Parent ! {msg_dbg,{ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang}} end,
  710: 		
  711:     ConnectionRef =
  712: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  713: 					  {user, "foo"},
  714: 					  {password, "morot"},
  715: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  716: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  717: 					  {ssh_msg_debug_fun,DbgFun}]),
  718:     %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
  719:     gen_statem:cast(ConnectionRef,{ssh_msg_debug,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}),
  720:     receive
  721: 	{msg_dbg,X={ConnectionRef,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}} ->
  722: 	    ct:log("Got expected dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  723: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid);
  724: 	{msg_dbg,X={_,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}} ->
  725: 	    ct:log("Got dbg msg but bad ConnectionRef (~p expected) ~p",[ConnectionRef,X]),
  726: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  727: 	    {fail, "Bad ConnectionRef received"};
  728: 	{msg_dbg,X} ->
  729: 	    ct:log("Got bad dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  730: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  731: 	    {fail,"Bad msg received"}
  732:     after 1000 ->
  733: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  734: 	    {fail,timeout}
  735:     end.

  737: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  738: connectfun_disconnectfun_server(Config) ->
  739:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  740:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  741: 
  742:     Parent = self(),
  743:     Ref = make_ref(),
  744:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connect,Ref} end,
  745:     DiscFun = fun(R) -> Parent ! {disconnect,Ref,R} end,
  746: 
  747:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  748: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  749: 					     {password, "morot"},
  750: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  751: 					     {disconnectfun, DiscFun},
  752: 					     {connectfun, ConnFun}]),
  753:     ConnectionRef =
  754: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  755: 					  {user, "foo"},
  756: 					  {password, "morot"},
  757: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  758: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  759:     receive
  760: 	{connect,Ref} ->
  761: 	    ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  762: 	    receive
  763: 		{disconnect,Ref,R} ->
  764: 		    ct:log("Disconnect result: ~p",[R]),
  765: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
  766: 	    after 10000 ->
  767: 		    receive
  768: 			X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  769: 		    after 0 -> ok
  770: 		    end,
  771: 		    {fail, "No disconnectfun action"}
  772: 	    end
  773:     after 10000 ->
  774: 	    receive
  775: 		X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  776: 	    after 0 -> ok
  777: 	    end,
  778: 	    {fail, "No connectfun action"}
  779:     end.
  780:

  817:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connection_pid,self()} end,
  818: 
  819:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  820: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  821: 					     {password, "morot"},
  822: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  823: 					     {connectfun, ConnFun},
  824: 					     {ssh_msg_debug_fun, DbgFun}]),
  825:     _ConnectionRef =
  826: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  827: 					  {user, "foo"},
  828: 					  {password, "morot"},
  829: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  830: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  831:     receive
  832: 	{connection_pid,Server} ->
  833: 	    %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
  834: 	    gen_statem:cast(Server,{ssh_msg_debug,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}),
  835: 	    receive
  836: 		{msg_dbg,X={_,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}} ->
  837: 		    ct:log("Got expected dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  838: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid);
  839: 		{msg_dbg,X} ->
  840: 		    ct:log("Got bad dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  841: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  842: 		    {fail,"Bad msg received"}
  843: 	    after 3000 ->
  844: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  845: 		    {fail,timeout2}
  846: 	    end
  847:     after 3000 ->
  848: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  849: 	    {fail,timeout1}
  850:     end.

  853: disconnectfun_option_server(Config) ->
  854:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),

  861: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  862: 					     {password, "morot"},
  863: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  864: 					     {disconnectfun, DisConnFun}]),
  865:     ConnectionRef =
  866: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  867: 					  {user, "foo"},
  868: 					  {password, "morot"},

  870: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),

  873: 	{disconnect,Reason} ->
  874: 	    ct:log("Server detected disconnect: ~p",[Reason]),
  875: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  876: 	    ok
  877:     after 5000 ->
  878: 	    receive
  879: 		X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  880: 	    after 0 -> ok
  881: 	    end,
  882: 	    {fail,"Timeout waiting for disconnect"}
  883:     end.

  894: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  895: 					     {password, "morot"},

  899: 					  {user, "foo"},
  900: 					  {password, "morot"},
  901: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  902: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  903: 					  {disconnectfun, DisConnFun}]),

  906: 	{disconnect,Reason} ->
  907: 	    ct:log("Client detected disconnect: ~p",[Reason]),
